content: Here you can check the apps info to which you have granted the auth access, and revoke consent if needed.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message explaining what authorized apps are and allowing users to revoke consent. It appears on an empty screen when there are no granted auth access apps.

usage.context:
return (
 <StyledContainer>
 {consents && consents?.length > 0 ? (
 <>
 <Text fontSize="12px" fontWeight="400" lineHeight="16px">
 {t("ProfileDescription")}
 </Text>
 
 <Consumer>
 {(context) =>
 viewAs === "table" ? (

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "granted the auth access" is not accurately reflected in the Arabic translation. "حق الوصول" (right of access) is a literal translation but doesn't convey the nuance of 'auth access'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هنا يمكنك التحقق من معلومات التطبيقات التي منحتها صلاحية الوصول (or) هنا يمكنك التحقق من معلومات التطبيقات التي منحتها إذن الوصول.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure could be slightly more natural in Arabic. The word order could be adjusted for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يمكنك هنا التحقق من معلومات التطبيقات التي منحتها صلاحية الوصول وإلغاء الموافقة إذا لزم الأمر.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "granted the auth access" is not accurate. "autentifikasiya girişi verdiyiniz" literally translates to 'authentication entry you gave'. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of 'authorized access' or 'given authorization'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Burada siz təyin etdiyiniz tətbiqlərin məlumatlarını yoxlaya və lazım olduqda icazəni ləğv edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'lazım olduqda' (if needed) could be more elegantly phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Burada siz autentifikasiya girişi verdiyiniz tətbiqlərin məlumatlarını yoxlaya və ehtiyacınız olarsa icazəni ləğv edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "auth access" is not naturally translated as "Auth-Zugriff". While technically correct, it's overly literal and doesn't flow well in German. It's better to use a more natural phrasing related to granting authorization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hier können Sie die Informationen der Apps überprüfen, denen Sie den Zugriff gewährt haben, und gegebenenfalls die Zustimmung widerrufen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Hyphenation of "Auth-Zugriff" is a bit unusual and makes the sentence feel less fluent.  Using a space is more common and stylistically preferable in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hier können Sie die Informationen der Apps überprüfen, denen Sie den Zugriff gewährt haben, und gegebenenfalls die Zustimmung widerrufen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "apps info" is translated as "հավելվածների տեղեկությունները". While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly translation for "apps info" might be "հավելվածների մասին տեղեկությունները" or "հավելվածների տեղեկացումները". The current translation is a bit literal.
The phrase "auth access" is not accurately translated. "auth" is an abbreviation and should be clarified or rephrased for Italian readers.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "accesso auth" with "accesso tramite OAuth" or "accesso con OAuth".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow in Italian. While technically correct, it reads a little clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider reordering the sentence to something like: 'Qui puoi controllare le informazioni sulle app a cui hai concesso l'accesso OAuth e, se necessario, revocare il consenso.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'apps info' is translated as 'ຂໍ້ມູນແອບພິເຄຊັນ' which is technically correct but sounds slightly awkward in Lao. A more natural phrasing might be 'ຂໍ້ມູນຂອງແອບພິເຄຊັນ' or 'ລາຍລະອຽດຂອງແອບພິເຄຊັນ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຂໍ້ມູນຂອງແອບພິເຄຊັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'auth access' is awkward in Dutch. It's better to use a more natural equivalent for 'authorization access'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hier kunt u de info van de apps controleren waaraan u autorisatie heeft verleend, en indien nodig de toestemming intrekken.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'toestemming' is a bit formal. 'Goedkeuring' might be more approachable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hier kunt u de info van de apps controleren waaraan u autorisatie heeft verleend, en indien nodig de goedkeuring intrekken.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "granted the auth access" is not accurately translated. "auth access" is awkward and technically imprecise in Polish. A more natural and accurate translation would focus on the granting of authorization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tutaj można sprawdzić informacje o aplikacjach, którym przyznano uprawnienia do autoryzacji i w razie potrzeby wycofać zgodę.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "auth access" is awkwardly translated. A more natural Romanian phrasing would be "accesul de autentificare" or "permisiunea de autentificare".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aici puteți verifica informații despre aplicațiile cărora le-ați acordat permisiunea de autentificare și puteți revoca consimțământul, dacă este cazul.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "dacă este cazul" is a slightly formal and somewhat stilted phrasing. It can be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aici puteți verifica informații despre aplicațiile cărora le-ați acordat permisiunea de autentificare și puteți revoca consimțământul, dacă doriți.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'revoke' is directly transliterated into Sinhala. It should be translated to a more natural equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබ බලපත්‍ර ප්‍රවේශය හිමි කර ඇති යෙදුම් තොරතුරු මෙහි පරීක්ෂා කර අවශ්‍ය නම් කැමැත්ත ඉවත් කර හැක.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow in Sinhala. The current structure 'ඔබ බලපත්‍ර ප්‍රවේශය හිමි කර ඇති යෙදුම් තොරතුරු මෙහි පරීක්ෂා කර අවශ්‍ය නම් කැමැත්ත ඉ revoke කර හැක.' is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම ස්ථානයේදී ඔබට බලපත්‍ර ප්‍රවේශය හිමි කර ඇති යෙදුම් පිළිබඳ තොරතුරු පරීක්ෂා කර, අවශ්‍ය නම් කැමැත්ත ඉවත් කර හැක.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'granted the auth access' is awkwardly translated. A more natural Serbian phrasing would be 'одалима сте дали дозволу' or 'одалима сте овластили'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Овде можете проверити информације о апликацијама одалима сте дали дозволу/овластили и, ако је потребно, опозвати пристанак.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'odobril' should be 'odobrovali' to agree with the plural 'aplikacijama'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ovde možete proveriti informacije o aplikacijama kojima ste odobrovali pristup i, ako je potrebno, opozvati pristanak.
